protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for somatostatins-14 and -28. This receptor is coupled via pertussis toxin sensitive G proteins to inhibition of adenylyl cyclase. In addition it stimulates phosphotyrosine phosphatase and PLC via pertussis toxin insensitive as well as sensitive G proteins. In RIN-5F cells, this receptor inhibits calcium entry by suppressing voltage dependent calcium-channels

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
